On-Site Tech Support

Local Tech Help That Comes to You

What We Can Help With

  • Computer setup, upgrades, and troubleshooting
  • Internet & Wi-Fi setup and optimization
  • Printer, router, and peripheral installations
  • Home network security checks
  • Smart device setup (TVs, tablets, speakers, etc.)
  • Software installs and configuration
  • One-on-one assistance and training

Pricing

$60/hour for standard on-site visits in Fairview.

Travel fees may apply for outlying rural areas.

Discounted rates available for seniors and repeat clients.

Book Your Visit

Call 780-330-9965 or contact us online to schedule an appointment. Same-day or next-day visits often available.

We're here to help you stay connected and confident with your tech!
